minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: Let's discuss the family financial concerns and where we stand.

minutes.speaker: Meera Vasanth
minutes.text: Can you take a break this weekend?. What happens to our home loan and savings if this doesn't work out?

minutes.speaker: Lakshmi Vasanth
minutes.text: Your health is more important. I'm worried about the stress you're under. Can you at least take Sundays off?

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: I'm trying to balance the business demands with our family needs.

minutes.speaker: Meera Vasanth
minutes.text: What about our savings?. I'm worried about the stress you're under. Can you at least take Sundays off?

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: I'm trying to balance the business demands with our family needs.

minutes.speaker: Meera Vasanth
minutes.text: You're working 16-hour days. The uncertainty is hard on all of us. Do you have a backup plan?

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: I appreciate your patience. This phase won't last forever.

minutes.speaker: Meera Vasanth
minutes.text: What about our savings?. The uncertainty is hard on all of us. Do you have a backup plan?

action_items.task: Create work-life balance plan and share with family
